name: Mr Rewind
description:
In this game you have multiple attemts to complete a level. But each attemt is recorded on a different player. Players need to interact with eachother in order to complete the game. New instances are created by going to the past (Rewinding).

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam so bugs can appear. I have tested every single level and they are all possible to finish. Some are harded some are easier. For best experience I suggest completing at least 10 first levels. They are the easiest and explain the game mechanics. 10 - 20 are for the true    G A M E R S     >:)

I hope you enjoy the game. You can check out the controls in the main menu.

TIPS

The recording system might not be perfect. For best results in more difficult and precise levels don't use the fast forward.

Don't skip the level on the count down it will bug the game out! Wait until your character can move.

On my device game starts with 11 levels unlocked. They shouldn't be! (Its a bug with Player Prefs pradobly :( ) Idk if anyone else also have them unlocked. Just ignore that and plat the first ones because starting from level 11 isn't a smart idea :/

I highlt suggest downloading a standalone build for Windows / Mac / Linux. Game looks a bit better and pradobly could run better than in borwser. But playing in browser is fine no features missing :)

Don't close the game in the Browser you can but it just disables it. You can refresh the page though.
